actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to allow persons in the custody under sentence of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia to apply for writs of habeas corpus in Federal courts on the same basis as person in custody pursuant to the judgment of a State court.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Code to allow persons in custody under sentence of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia to apply for writs of habeas corpus in Federal courts on the same basis as persons in custody pursuant to the judgment of a State court.

titles.title: A bill to allow persons in the custody under sentence of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia to apply for writs of habeas corpus in Federal courts on the same basis as person in custody pursuant to the judgment of a State court.
